description:
The crooning casts of Glee and Pitch Perfect dominated the second wave of Teen Choice 2013 nominations, which were announced Monday.

They join the previously announced frontrunners Twilight: Breaking Dawn - Part 2 with seven nominations and Iron Man 3 with six.

Taylor Swift will compete against her BFF, Come & Get It singer Selena Gomez, in two categories - Choice Single: Female Artist and Choice Break-Up Song.

The seven-time Grammy winner, 23, also scored a nod for Choice Country Artist.

The Teen Choice Awards celebrates the hottest teen icons in TV, music, film, sports, fashion, comedy, and the web.

Fans aged 13-19 are invited to vote once each day per category for their favorite celebrities at TeenChoiceAwards.com until 11:59 PM PT on August 10.

沪江娱乐：2013年青少年选择奖第二波提名名单已经公布了，美国青少年选择奖 (Teen Choice Award) 是由福克斯推出的一项年度电影奖，本奖项用来表彰和奖励本年度在音乐、电影、体育、电视和流行领域所取得的成就。此次电影方面《暮光之城：破晓下》以7项提名领跑，《钢铁侠3》以6项提名紧随其后；小天后泰勒·斯威夫特则要和闺蜜赛琳娜·戈麦斯竞争最佳女歌手和最具突破歌手。

参加本奖项的投票者都是年龄在13至19岁的青少年，他们可以TeenChoiceAwards.com上投票选出自己喜欢的明星们。

2013青少年选择奖提名（第二波）

MOVIES 电影类

Choice Movie Villain 最佳反派
Javier Bardem, Skyfall 哈维尔·巴登 《007:大破天幕杀机》
Adam DeVine, Pitch Perfect 亚当·迪瓦恩 《完美音调》
Tom Hardy, The Dark Knight Rises 汤姆·哈迪 《黑暗骑士崛起》
Ben Kingsley, Iron Man 3 本·金斯利《钢铁侠3》
Melissa McCarthy, Identity Thief 梅丽莎·麦卡锡《身份窃贼》

Choice Movie Scene Stealer 最抢镜演员
